aboutMeText: I'm frontend developer with three years of experience. I have as main experiences HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js and React Native. I'm able to develop mobile apps, sites and beautiful and responsive web applications. I'm always learning new skills and I'm dedicating myself to become a full-stack developer.
firedevResume1: I improved my front-end developer skills a lot, my programming logic, my communication and I learn new skills.
firedevResume2: I performed code refactor and faced challenges.
firedevResume3: The main tools I used was ReactJS, React Native, Typescript and NodeJS.
egsResume1: Using Expo, React Native and Typescript, I'm mobile developer here.
egsResume2: I make features, solve bugs, and perform refactoring.
egsResume3: We use Azure for tasks management and for git
